com.nkoiv.mists.game.world

Class MapGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nkoiv.mists.game.world.MapGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Global

    public class MapGenerator
extends Object
implements Global
    MapGenerator makes maps for Locations. It uses procedural generation, splitting the given area in smaller and smaller chunks randomly, until its satisfied with what it has. After the area has been split into segments, its populated by rooms that are joined by corridors.
    Author:
    nikok

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MapGenerator.BSParea
      BSPareas are areas inside the map that house the rooms.

      • drawAreasOnMap

        public static int[][] drawAreasOnMap(int mapWidth,
                                     int mapHeight,
                                     ArrayList<MapGenerator.BSParea> arealist,
                                     int roomMinSize)
        DrawAreasOnMap takes in a list of BSPareas, and turns them into an int array.
        Parameters:
        mapWidth - Width of the map to create
        mapHeight - Height ofthe map to create
        arealist - BSP areas to create map from
        roomMinSize - minimum room size to generate inside the BPS areas
        Returns:
        int[][] that has the map

      • doorwayCleaner

        public static int[][] doorwayCleaner(int[][] intMap)
        Doorwaycleaner takes in a map and removes redundant doors from it. Extra doors might be generated when corridors overlap or when they hit just between areas. There's also no point in having doors on the edge of the map
        Parameters:
        intMap - the map to clean
        Returns:
        cleaned version of the map

      • mapToString

        public static String mapToString(int[][] intMap,
                                 int xSize,
                                 int ySize)
        MapToStrinp converts a map into easily printable format, either for testing or saving into a file.
        Parameters:
        intMap - the map to print
        xSize - width of the map
        ySize - height of the map
        Returns:
        String describing the map

        public static Direction getDirection(int xDist,

        Return a Direction(enum) towards target, given the X and Y distance. Used in pathing corridors
        Parameters:
        xDist - Distance towards the target
        yDist - Distance towards the target
